summary: This is an adaptation/revision of Laxi2610\'s \"CBBE Daedric Female\" mod, which was an adaptation/revision of MaikCG\'s Daedric Female replacer.
descriptionHtml:
First things first.
THIS IS A VERY ADULT ORIENTED MOD.  NSFW!! NSFW!!

THIS MOD REQUIRES CHSBHC to be installed: go here to download it: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888

This adaptation uses cherry\'s mod to give some bounce to the breasts.

Ok, now that that\'s done.  This mod is an adaptation (and fairly subsantial revision) to Laxi2610\'s CBBE Daedric Female mod.
(Found here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6316 )

Laxi\'s mod is based off of this MaikCG\'s Daedric Female Replacer Mod.
(Found here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5162 )

At this point, I\'m not sure who to credit, or who\'s stuff to make you go download to preserve the tree of appropriate endorsements, but these guys (and girl) above, did a lot of work and made this thing possible.
That being said, I\'ve clumped all their work into one nice easy to use bundle.  I will not be forcing you to go play scavenger hunt to make this thing work even though it might be politically correct for me to do so.

Now, what I did, is take the mesh from these guys, and overhaul it for 20+ hours to make it CHSBHC ready, resulting in a shiny, animated Daedric Female replacement mesh.

There are 5 possible files to choose from depending on which suits your fancy.

Two versions of my sort of serpentine adaptation of the original mod.  One has a pelvic guard, the other has this removed, as the lower half of this armor started to look like a chastity belt.
Note, this is a NSFW version!  Nipples are not covered! (Oh my!  How scandalous!)

Two versions of Laxi\'s original concept, one with a bulky pelvic guard, and one without.

Lastly a topless version that has no scaly bits covering breasts at all.  To be honest, not all that different from the other 4 versions, just I know people love their skin...

For those of you curious what a pelvic guard is, there is a very self explanatory picture I have uploaded.


THIS MOD WILL WORK WITH OTHER TEXTURES.
But it will only apply to the boots gloves & helm, NOT THE CHEST.

Edit:: Some people are reporting some texture conflicts, I\'m not sure why that is the case, but just posting it here.


Recommended supplemental mods: 
Open Faced Helmets, makes your daedric helm, a little less demonic and out of character with the rest of the body.  Something Laxi thought kind of matches the general theme of less armor, that this mod exemplifies.  I second his opinion.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4866

===========
CHANGELOG
+++++++++++

v1.1 , fixed some really aggravating weighting issues with the rear skirt.  I just couldn\'t leave it alone, even with the CK on the immediate horizon.



Known Issues:

There are some odd behaviors around the tail of the spine & midway through the coil while running and power attacking with a two hand weapon. I need the CK to fix this easily, thankfully it\'s not far off.

Skirts, fabric flaps, leather flaps, metal flaps, and anything around the pelvic region is horribly difficult to get to animate correctly.  The skirt bunches as if it were made out of rigid material, this is somewhat intentional, as it was the best way I could manage to animate it and not have it just knot itself into an endless mush of polygons during sneak animations.  I didn\'t make a bottomless version, on account that you might as well just walk around naked at that point...


ENJOY!!
author: White Rabbit
